localizedMeta.description:
THIS CONTENT IS NOT COMPATIBLE WITH Androidâ„¢ DEVICES.

Help Ava rescue her best friend Shiver the zebra in an adventure of letters, colors, and shapes!

Ava discovers a map showing the way to Alphabet Island. She and her best friend Shiver Sparkles decide to venture out to the island and have a picnic on the beach. But little do they know, the island is inhabited by a fairy, goblin, werewolf, and witch!

Package size: 82 MB - More storage space required for install

Compatibility information:
Number of players for local play: 1 Player

Supported interfaces/sensors
- Touchscreen
- Controller / On-screen controller

Supported languages:
English(United States)
